statements: UPDATE supplier_info SET contact_name = 'John Doe' WHERE supplier_id = 1;

UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 100 WHERE item_name = 'Laptop' AND supplier_id = (SELECT supplier_id FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Corp');
